title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.22 - Adult beds
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.22 - Adult beds

State Regulations

Those beds assigned for regular use by inpatients who are
14 years of age or over, and which are maintained in areas allotted for adult
or adolescent lodging, even though in some instances utilized by
children. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
441.22

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
